title: MCC ගිවිසුම ජන්දයෙන් පසුව අත්සන් කරන බව ඇමරිකානු තානාපතිනිය පැවසුවාද?
author: srilanka.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
It’s clear that U.S. is trying desperately to get the agreement signed. Let’s be honest. Their sole intention is to take control of the country and use it as a U.S. military base. 40 of 43 countries who signed MCC agreements are said to have ended up with a military base installed in their country and loosing their sovereignty. Although President Rajapaksa who promised nearly 7 million Sri Lankan people who appointed him into the office, and despite the growing opposition including his committee’s recommendation, as a typical corrupted Sri Lankan politician, he shows signs toward signing the agreement. For example, his new Minister of Security Affairs, Mr. Colombage told WION news yesterday that India is No.1 on Sri Lanka’s foreign policy. As we all know, India is an American puppet. He also said in his inauguration speech “We must learn to think outside the box”. He went on to say, “no one will loose any lands that are inherited in the family”.

 We just have to wait and see what he’s going to do. If he signs the MCC trap, him and his party will face the same consequences as UNP, at next election, or sooner.
